item.title: Using AI to Automate Your Sales and Marketing
item.description: Overview This post explains how to use AI tools like ChatGPT and AI video creation to fully automate your sales and marketing process. The key steps are: Find a product to promote Create a landing page and automated email sequence Drive traffic to your landing page Let AI follow up and convert leads into sales Step 1: Find a Product to Promote If you don’t already have a product or business, you can promote affiliate products.
